title: t205 Mathewson, t201 and t210 for sale

posts.post_title: t205 Mathewson, t201 and t210 for sale
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I have the following cards for sale:

Mathewson PSA 3 MC (top to bottom) - otherwise very sharp card - SOLD delivered including tracking/signature confirmation.

[URL=http://s906.photobucket.com/user/martincp-cards/media/t205/ChristyMathewson.jpg.html][IMG]http://i906.photobucket.com/albums/ac266/martincp-cards/t205/ChristyMathewson.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL=http://s906.photobucket.com/user/martincp-cards/media/t205/ChristyMathewsonBack.jpg.html][IMG]http://i906.photobucket.com/albums/ac266/martincp-cards/t205/ChristyMathewsonBack.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

t201 Lush/Hauser SGC50 - with ghost image (see top of front scan) - $60 delivered

[URL=http://s906.photobucket.com/user/martincp-cards/media/Others/t201LushHauser.jpg.html][IMG]http://i906.photobucket.com/albums/ac266/martincp-cards/Others/t201LushHauser.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL=http://s906.photobucket.com/user/martincp-cards/media/Others/t201LushHauserBack.jpg.html][IMG]http://i906.photobucket.com/albums/ac266/martincp-cards/Others/t201LushHauserBack.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

t212 175 subjects - Hensling - raw (stamp mark on back) - $44 delivered

[URL=http://s906.photobucket.com/user/martincp-cards/media/Others/Obak175Hensling.jpg.html][IMG]http://i906.photobucket.com/albums/ac266/martincp-cards/Others/Obak175Hensling.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL=http://s906.photobucket.com/user/martincp-cards/media/Others/Obak175HenslingBack.jpg.html][IMG]http://i906.photobucket.com/albums/ac266/martincp-cards/Others/Obak175HenslingBack.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Paypal gift please. 
Thank you - Martin
Any questions please PM or ameil to [url]marpar73@hotmail.com[/url]
